DOC.criteria: Low intermediate risk prostate cancer patient define : Clinical stage T12b , Gleason Score < =7 , PSA < =20 ng/mL Age > = 18 year Androgen deprivation therapy ( LHRHagonists antiandrogens ) > 6 month Prior pelvic radiotherapy Anticoagulation medication ( unsafe discontinue gold seed insertion ) Diagnosis bleed diathesis Large prostate ( > 90cm3 ) image Immunosuppressive medication Inflammatory bowel disease
